author: nadiramra
msg: AXIS2C-1478 Changes due to port to IBM i (aka OS/400).

author: doogie
msg: Return the value of needsUpperCase from getIndexInfo, so that the proper case can be used on declared index names.

author: doogie
msg: When fetching index info, if needsUpperCase is set, then the incoming tableName has been upper-cased. This means we have to convert it *back* to lower case when querying indices against the database.

author: doogie
msg: Add comment that describes why there is a check of the index name existing in set.
